questions.questionText: Complete the sentence about cellular respiration

content.template: Cellular respiration occurs in the ___ and converts glucose into ___ which is used for energy.

questions.hint: Think about the organelle known as the powerhouse of the cell and the energy currency molecule
questions.explanation: Cellular respiration takes place in the mitochondria, where glucose is broken down to produce ATP (adenosine triphosphate), the cell's main energy currency.
